name: Nautical Twilight
description:
In Nautical Twilight, you play as a small octopus trying to save it's world; the ocean. You must retrieve three gems in order to restore the water levels, and save the friendly whales who help you along the way. 

Controls:

Left click to move, and right click (or space!) to dash. E to interact with NPC's and objects and "F" to use echolocation once it is unlocked.

Along the way we ran into a few challenges, but the biggest one was the time limit. With a team composed of several procrastinators, we found the deadline approached much sooner than we expected. A few other challenges included Git merge conflicts and issues debugging.

One of the highlights of our game is the boss fight. The final fight — an "AI" that decides between a variety of attacks — is a satisfying culmination to an epic quest.
